channel.title: Workstation 9.x freezes while browsing search engine "xmh57jrzrnw6insl.onion"
channel.description:
All,
After a relatively short period of clicking on links in "tor search engine" [[url=http://xmh57jrzrnw6insl.onion]http://xmh57jrzrnw6insl.onion[/url]] via default TOR browser, workstation 9.x freezes up [u]completely[/u] - VM needs to be powered off and restarted! I've tried [u]several[/u] times - each time same o', same o'!
Don't have any issues with tor browser in and of itself per se.
Anyone else experience this?
thx

item.title: Workstation 9.x freezes while browsing search engine "xmh57jrzrnw6insl.onion"
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thanks for clearing that up!

Read full topic

item.title: Workstation 9.x freezes while browsing search engine "xmh57jrzrnw6insl.onion"
item.dc:creator: mutsuura
item.description:
Patrick et al

My bad it appears.

I restored my workstation VM from my SVN repository and it doesn’t appear to freeze any more. Sorry for the false alarm/report.

I must have installed or done ‘something’ that messed up the VM. Since restoring, it hasn’t frozen up so all’s well!

v/r

item.description:
Works for me.

Using latest version of Tor Browser?

Does it happen when using TBB in Debian (VMs)?

All,

After a relatively short period of clicking on links in “tor search engine” [http://xmh57jrzrnw6insl.onion] via default TOR browser, workstation 9.x freezes up completely - VM needs to be powered off and restarted! I’ve tried several times - each time same o’, same o’!
